name: urlparser
description: To install just unzip the zipped file in a web server directory. To run the script you should have Linux, Apache, php >= 5.0. Example: http://localhost/parseurl.php?url=http://localhost. You can also use web interface. Just go to http:/localhost/index.html. To run unit tests go to "tests" directory and type: "php phpunit.phar URLParserTest.php"
